changes: Fixed bugs in the Sleep and Stamina mod related to stamina regeneration.
Enhanced user interface for easier configuration of all mods.
Added new feature to the Weather System mod allowing dynamic weather changes based on in-game time.
Improved performance of the Upscaler mod for better frame rates on lower-end systems.
Initial release with core mod and three additional mods: Sleep and Stamina, Upscaler, and Weather System.
